title: T212 Obak Criger LA and Williams San Fran
author: lampertb

posts.post_title: T212 Obak Criger LA and Williams San Fran
posts.post_content:
For sale individually, plus $3.00 additional shipping.  The reverse pics are in the same position, so Criger is "Everyone Satisfies."  Both have a horizontal crease.
Criger - $45
Williams - $45
Feel free to make me an offer, though.

A couple of my favorites in the 1910 set...the artwork and colors on them are stunning.  Good luck with their sales.

Brian
